attributes.action: repay all expenses claimed within the last 4 years by himself and his cabinet
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Expenses claimed by MPs, whilst apparently within the letter of parliamentary rules are clearly excessive and unjustifiable.  To restore public faith in parliament the Prime Minister and his cabinet should make a grand gesture and repay ALL expenses they have claimed within the last 4 years.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
